data.text:
A while later. I wanted to hear Agnes Digital out some more, so 
I went to look for her.

...You there. What are you up to, looking all shifty? 
Are you perhaps, perish the thought, stalking Umamusume, in 
broad daylight?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Ahahaha! I kid, I kid. That'd make you a dead ringer for the 
"Umamusume-chan-loving trainer" Digital-kun's been talking 
about.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: Oh, dear, it really is you? Well, well...
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
If you're looking for Digital-kun, she's out right now. En route to 
the train station, by the look of it. I'd wager she's on the hunt for 
more Umamusume merch, as usual――
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
...Hmm, a trainer seeking out Digital-kun, eh? 
Will she able to keep someone like that at arm's length? 
Fufu, how fascinating.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Following Agnes Tachyon's advice, I kept looking for Digital. And 
then――
Ahh~...
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Oh, legs gliding upon verdant grass, full of elegance and grace... 
Oh, legs pushing with force upon the earth, full of vim and vigor...
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Which prints do I buy? ――A foolish question! 
I'm getting both, obviously!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Ahhh, thou who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name! 
For granting me life in a world blessed with so many goddesses!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: Yes―― I, Digitan, devote my youth to you, Umamusume-chans! I was wrong to even think about running with them!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: Uh, whaddya want...? Whom...?
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: Bwah...!? I- Th...!? Sori, but, did, yoo, purhaps, here, every, thing, eye, sed...?
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: Well, you already overhead all that――
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
But this is seriously the biggest of the biggest of big questions! 
Just think about it! Who am I!? That's RIGHT――!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
――I am AGNES DIGITAL! The Umamusume who loves 
Umamusume-chans more than any other!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: Do you really think I can just choose between turf Umamusume-chans and dirt Umamusume-chans?
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
No way, no way, no freaking way!! It's just as impossible as 
playing the mandolin without a pick!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: And that's why you won't run yourself?
choices.processed: <size=42>And that's why you won't run yourself?</size>

data.text: Exaaactly. The perfect place for me is quietly revering my faves behind the monitor...
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Ahh... On that fateful day of my childhood, watching those 
Umamusume-chans on TV, just how moved I was... 
How could I ever forget...
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Seeing the Umamusume-chans clash, each with her own feelings 
in tow... It wasn't just their brilliance that moved me...
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
It was their "will"...! 
Their will made me think they were just so precious.
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: I was blessed enough to be born an Umamusume, too. ――And an Umamusume has to run!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
The race is the ultimate stage for Umamusume-chans to shine! 
And I wanted to see every last one of them shine as bright as 
they can! I wanted to support them with everything I had!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Even though choosing would force me to miss some of them. 
Even then...! 
...I steeled my will, I guess.
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
I enrolled at Tracen Academy. 
But when I took just one step on school grounds――
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Hee hee hee, hoo hoo hoo... 
Ahh, the air is brimming with Umamusume-chans' lovely 
laughter...
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
My faves are here, flesh and blood! They're real... They're 3D... 
Their breathing, their heartbeats, their footsteps, I can hear them 
all up close!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
Ahhh, these aren't just pictures on a screen! 
They're the real Umamusume-chans of Tracen Academy... 
...When that realization hit me――
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: ――Oh, it blew my freaking mind!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: "I steeled my will"!? Are you kidding? My flimsy will wasn't worth squat!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: Not when I got to see all my beloved Umamusume-chans in IRL HD...!! And to top it all off, I find out I've got the goods for both track types?
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
There's just no way!! How the heck am I supposed to choose 
between turf and dirt?!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: ...Nay, the truest choice is not to choose at all!!! That is the way of the fan!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text: So I'm not going to choose!! I'm not going to run on EITHER track!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
She put it all out in the open. 
You could say she had nothing to hide. But――

So, what about you? Do you think you've got time to waste on 
little old me? Shouldn't you go give your attention to those other 
Umamusume-chans?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: (There's another way of looking at this...)
choices.processed: <size=40>(There's another way of looking at this...)</size>

data.text:
Fu fu fu. Don't have a comeback, now do you? 
Well, then, I'll be off――
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: ――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!
choices.processed: <size=34>――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!</size>

choices.text: ――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!
choices.processed: <size=34>――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!</size>

data.text:
...Uh, were you, perchance, not listening to what I said? 
I didn't even have the will to make that choice, you know?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: No, you had the will to not make that choice!
choices.processed: No, you had the will to not make that choice!

choices.text: No, you had the will to not make that choice!
choices.processed: No, you had the will to not make that choice!

data.text: Bwuh...?
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
I remembered―― Despite her small size, she showed tremendous 
strength on the dirt track.

And she ran nimbly across the turf, with just as much skill as she 
did on dirt.

She couldn't choose between them, so she gave it her all on 
both. So why not use that to her advantage!?――

Ummmm... 
I, um, beg your pardon, but I understand not what you are saying 
here...
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
I explained my idea to her right away. 
Then――
BWGHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!!!!!???
data.name: Agnes Digital

data.text:
――A few days later. 
Word started to get around about a certain something.
Hey, d'you hear? The thing with Digital...!
data.name: Vodka

data.text:
I heard! But I still can't believe it. 
It really came out of nowhere...
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet

data.text: I can't believe she registered for the both the turf and dirt Selection Races...!
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
